definitions.definition: To burn or shine unsteadily, or with a wavering light.
To keep going on and off; to appear and disappear for short moments; to flutter.
To flutter; to flap the wings without flying.

definitions.example: Even after the acrimonious breakup, she still felt flickerings of love for him.

definitions.definition: Shining unsteadily or vary rapidly in brightness (referring to a light or a source of light)
